search.queryText:
((_sourceCategory="cloud/http/dns") "DNS update latency:")
| parse "latency: */*/*/* micro seconds" as latency_5,latency_15,latency_60,latency

| timeslice 5m
| count by _timeslice, latency, _sourcehost
//| avg(latency) as latency by _sourcehost
| transpose row _timeslice, latency column _sourcehost

((_sourceCategory="cloud/http/dns"))
| where event_type = "dhcp_resolve"
| parse "response [data: *," as resolved_ip
| parse "qname: *," as dhcp_name

_sourceCategory="cloud/http/dns"
| where(_raw contains "DHCPREQUEST")
| "" as device_ip
| "" as device_ip2
| "" as device_mac
| "" as transaction_id
| "" as uid
| "" as interface
| "" as relay_ip
| "" as hostname
| parse regex ".*DHCPREQUEST\sfor\s(?<device_ip>.+?)\sfrom\s(?<device_mac>[a-f0-9:]+?)\s\((?<hostname>.*?)\)\svia\s(?<interface>.*?)\sTransID\s(?<transaction_id>.*?)\suid\s(?<uid>.*?)\s.*" nodrop
| parse regex ".*DHCPREQUEST\sfor\s(?<device_ip>.+?)\s\((?<device_ip2>.*?)\)\sfrom\s(?<device_mac>[a-f0-9:]+?)\svia\s(?<relay_ip>.*?)\sTransID\s(?<transaction_id>.*?)$" nodrop
//| parse regex ".*DHCPREQUEST\sfor\s(?<device_ip>.+?)\s(\((?<device_ip2>.*?)\)\s)?from\s(?<device_mac>[a-f0-9:]+?)\s\((?<hostname>.*?)\)\svia\s(?<relay_ip>.*?)\sTransID\s(?<transaction_id>\S+)" nodrop
| parse regex ".*DHCPREQUEST\sfor\s(?<device_ip>.+?)\sfrom\s(?<device_mac>[a-f0-9:]+?)\svia\s(?<relay_ip>.*?)\sTransID\s(?<transaction_id>.*?)\suid\s(?<uid>.*?)\s.*" nodrop
| parse regex ".*DHCPREQUEST\sfor\s(?<device_ip>.+?)\sfrom\s(?<device_mac>[a-f0-9:]+?)\svia\s(?<relay_ip>.*?)\sTransID\s(?<transaction_id>.*?)$" nodrop

_sourceCategory="cloud/http/dns"
| where(_raw contains "DHCPACK")
| "" as device_ip
| "" as device_mac
| "" as lease_duration
| "" as interface
| "" as relay_ip
| "" as hostname
| "" as relay
//| where event_type = "dhcp_ack"
| parse regex ".*DHCPACK\son\s(?<device_ip>.+?)\sto\s(?<device_mac>[a-f0-9:]+?)\s\((?<hostname>.+?)\)\s.+lease-duration\s(?<lease_duration>\d+)" nodrop
| parse regex ".*DHCPACK\son\s(?<device_ip>.+?)\sto\s(?<device_mac>[a-f0-9:]+?)\svia\s(?<interface>.+?)\srelay\s(?<relay_ip>.+?)\slease-duration\s(?<lease_duration>\d+)" nodrop
| parse regex ".*DHCPACK\sto\s(?<device_ip>.+?)\s\((?<device_mac>[a-f0-9:]+?)\)" nodrop
| parse regex ".*DHCPACK on (?<device_ip>.*?)\sto\s(?<device_mac>[a-f0-9:]+?)\s(?<hostname>.*?)\svia\s(?<interface>.*?)\srelay\s(?<relay>.*?)\slease-duration\s(?<lease_duration>.*?)\s.*" nodrop

queries.queryString:
_sourceCategory=pssmonp0509/syslog1515/infoblox
| count by event_type
| sort by _count desc

_sourceCategory=pssmonp0509/syslog1515/infoblox
| where event_type = "dns_query"
| where _sourcehost matches "{{infoblox_host}}"
| timeslice 1m | count by event_type, _timeslice
//| (_count/12)/120 as dns_per_sec
| transpose row _timeslice column event_type

(((_sourcecategory=pssmonp0509/syslog1515/infoblox)) AND "query:")
| parse "query: * IN" as query_hostname
| where !isEmpty(query_hostname)
| count by query_hostname
| sort by _count desc
| limit 10

_sourceCategory=pssmonp0509/syslog1515/infoblox
| where event_type = "dhcp_request"
| where _sourcehost matches "{{infoblox_host}}"
| timeslice 1m | count by event_type, _timeslice
//| (_count/12)/120 as dns_per_sec
| transpose row _timeslice column event_type

(_sourceCategory="pssmonp0509/syslog1515/infoblox") AND "request ["
| parse "response [data: *," as resolved_ip
| parse "qname: *," as dhcp_name
| count by dhcp_name
| sort by _count desc
| limit 10

_sourceCategory=pssmonp0509/syslog1515/infoblox
| where event_type = "dns_query"
| where _sourcehost matches "{{infoblox_host}}"
| timeslice 1s | count by event_type, _timeslice
//| (_count/12)/120 as dns_per_sec
| transpose row _timeslice column event_type

_sourceCategory=pssmonp0509/syslog1515/infoblox
| where event_type = "dhcp_request"
| where _sourcehost matches "{{infoblox_host}}"
| timeslice 1s | count by event_type, _timeslice
//| (_count/12)/120 as dns_per_sec
| transpose row _timeslice column event_type

(_sourceCategory="pssmonp0509/syslog1515/infoblox")
| where event_type in("dns_query", "serv_fail")
| if(_raw contains "SERVFAIL" or _raw contains "NXDOMAIN" or _raw contains "FAILURE" or _raw contains "NXRRSET", "true", "false") as failure
| where failure = "true"
| timeslice 1m | count by failure, _timeslice
////| (_count/12)/120 as dns_per_sec
| transpose row _timeslice column failure

(_sourceCategory="pssmonp0509/syslog1515/infoblox")
| where event_type in("dns_query", "serv_fail")
| if(_raw contains "SERVFAIL" or _raw contains "NXDOMAIN" or _raw contains "FAILURE" or _raw contains "NXRRSET", "true", "false") as failure
| where failure = "false"
| timeslice 1m | count by failure, _timeslice
////| (_count/12)/120 as dns_per_sec
| transpose row _timeslice column failure

_sourceCategory="pssmonp0509/syslog1515/infoblox"
| where event_type = "dns_query"
| where !isNull(device_ip)
| count by device_ip | sort by _count desc | limit 10

_sourceCategory=pssmonp0509/syslog1515/infoblox
| if(_raw contains "]: Logout", "logout", audit_type) as audit_type
| if(_raw contains "]: Login_Allowed", "login", audit_type) as audit_type
| if(_raw contains "]: Called", "call", audit_type) as audit_type
| if(_raw contains "]: Deleted", "delete", audit_type) as audit_type
| where !isNull(audit_type)
| count by audit_type

search.queryText:
_sourceCategory="cloud/http/dns"
| where(_raw contains "query:")
| "" as device_ip
| "" as dns_flags
| "" as dns_record_type
| "" as dns_query
| "" as dns_class
| "" as hostname
| "" as client_id
| "" as source_port
| "" as dns_response
| parse "client @* *#* (*):" as client_id,device_ip,source_port,hostname nodrop
| parse "client *#*:" as device_ip,source_port nodrop
| parse regex ".*query:\s(?<dns_query>.+?)\s(?<dns_class>.+?)\s(?<dns_record_type>.+?)(?:\sresponse:\s|\s)(?<dns_flags>\S*)\s?\(?(?<dns_response>[^\)]+)\)?" nodrop

((_sourceCategory="cloud/http/dns" and _collector="Hosted (Network)"))
| if(_raw contains "query:", "dns_query", event_type) as event_type
| if(_raw contains "updating zone", "zone_update", event_type) as event_type
| if(_raw contains "DHCPACK", "dhcp_ack", event_type) as event_type
| if(_raw contains "DHCPDISCOVER", "dhcp_discover", event_type) as event_type
| if(_raw contains "DHCPOFFER", "dhcp_offer", event_type) as event_type
| if(_raw contains "DHCPREQUEST", "dhcp_request", event_type) as event_type
| if(_raw contains "request [", "dhcp_resolve", event_type) as event_type
| if(_raw contains "DHCPINFORM", "dhcp_inform", event_type) as event_type
| if(_raw contains "ZRQ", "zrq", event_type) as event_type
| if(_raw contains "SERVFAIL", "serv_fail", event_type) as event_type

_sourceCategory="cloud/http/dns"
| "" as zone
| "" as action
| "" as hostname
| "" as ttl
| "" as class
| "" as type
| "" as device_ip
| "" as dns_class
| "" as transaction_status
| "" as transaction_id
| "" as soa_serial_number
| "" as updated_zone_version
//| where event_type = "zrq"
| parse regex ".*zone\s(?<zone>.+?)\:\sZRQ applied (?<action>ADD|DELETE) for \'(?<hostname>.*?)\'\:\s(?<ttl>.*?)\s(?<class>.*?)\s(?<type>.*?)\s(?<device_ip>.*?)\s.*" nodrop
| parse regex ".*zone\s(?<zone>[^\/]+)\/(?<dns_class>[A-Z]{2}):\sZRQ\s(?<transaction_status>\S+)\stransaction\s(?<transaction_id>\d+)(?:\.$|\swith\sSOA\sserial\s(?<soa_serial_number>\d+)\.\sZone\sversion\sis\snow\s(?<updated_zone_version>\d+))" nodrop
